promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute special serpent fire-type pokemon wearing dark armor. It can be found in volcano-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Pytharmor, a a chibi cute special serpent fire-type pokemon. It can be found in volcano-like environments It has the following abilities: Victory Ball, Gripthrow. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "fire" or "Pytharmor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, serpent-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Chibi-adorable Pytharmor enjoys basking in lava-filled landscapes. With Victory Ball and Gripthrow, it playfully tosses flaming spheres!
